name: Fractal Insight
description:
The mind can be a dark place, riddled with unpleasant things, especially for those who have experienced hardship with psychiatric disorders. Fractal Insight is a visual, interactive representation of some of the themes attached to mental illness. 

It is up the player's (that's you!) interpretation to form an understanding of the environment and events within the game. 

There is sound so please turn the volume up!

- MINOR TRIGGER WARNING -

This game is not meant to do any harm but just raise awareness of mental health. The themes in this game are NOT EXPLICIT but please DO NOT play if you are easily triggered. 

How To Play:

Left Click on the mouse, and the mouse navigation is all you need to play. 

Press "R" to Restart

Credits:

All art assets are made and owned by hEcK Studios

Most sound assets made and owned by hEcK Studios

External Sound Assets:

- https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary/soundeffects, sounds Radio Static, Suspense Builder and Warm Afternoon Outdoors.
